column4: wow, i have to say that there is nothing more frustrating than not being able to do a simple task like watch a dvd
i have 3 applications installed with dvd support, none of which are working
i just want a package that does that
i didnt give automatix a try yet
Try it, worked great for me. YMMV
well, im following the wiki, and it had me run a shell script
so thats was 'hopefully' all i needed
except when updates break compiz... sob!
lol, compiz is my next step
